title: Lowest Water Stress
description: In 2021, Congo had a water stress level of only 2.74%, indicating minimal freshwater withdrawal compared to available resources.

title: Minimal Freshwater Withdrawals
description: Congo's annual freshwater withdrawals were just 2.07% of its internal resources in 2021, one of the lowest in the world.

title: Fewest Surgical Procedures
description: In 2018, Congo had only 49 surgical procedures per 100,000 population, indicating limited access to surgical care.

title: High Binding Coverage for Primary Products
description: In 2015, Congo had a binding coverage of 52.18% for primary products, indicating a high level of trade restrictions.

title: Low New Displacements Due to Conflict
description: Congo reported only 2 new cases of displacement due to conflict and violence in 2019, showing relative stability.
